metadata.title: CVE-2021-30537 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in cookies in Google Chrome prior to91.0.4472.77 allowed a remote attacker to bypass cookie policy via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
